body_html:
I just checked the code, it seems that "static void tensorflow::RdmaMgr::RegMemVisitors()" are newly introduced in 33170cc
Just wonder if it is the cause.
It seems this static member functions try to directly access non-static member (RdmaAdapter* rdma_adapter_;)
body_text:
I just checked the code, it seems that "static void tensorflow::RdmaMgr::RegMemVisitors()" are newly introduced in 33170cc
Just wonder if it is the cause.
It seems this static member functions try to directly access non-static member (RdmaAdapter* rdma_adapter_;)
body:
I just checked the code, it seems that "static void tensorflow::RdmaMgr::RegMemVisitors()" are newly introduced in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/33170cc661f3838aa7d0d7fc19bb0c6ba4812a3c
Just wonder if it is the cause.
It seems this static member functions try to directly access non-static member (RdmaAdapter* rdma_adapter_;)
